title: Vlad BTCTKVR
author: Vlad BTCTKVR
content: Hi!I thought you guys might be interested in checking out this interview I've recorded with Thomas Voegtlin, creator of Electrum: https://bitcoin-takeover.com/s12-e1-thomas-voegtlin-on-electrum-wallet-lightning-trampoline-nodesIt's also available on Youtube https://youtu.be/TyJSdc2-da4, Spotify https://open.spotify.com/episode/4ZynGQX9apCj3wYQqzVjdK?si=40f0e73ddc4b43f2, Apple Podcasts https://podcasts.apple.com/ro/podcast/bitcoin-takeover-podcast/id1451766883?i=1000580507473, and pretty much every streaming platform.Thanks and let me know your feedback â€“ if it's positive, then I'll keep on posting new threads with other episodes. Otherwise, if the admins consider it's better, I'll set up a thread for my podcast and use it to publish updates as replies to it. https://bitcoin-takeover.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Thomas-Voegtlin-Electrum-Wallet-Trampoline-Nodes-Bitcoin-Takeover-Podcast-Season-12-Episode-1-Interv.jpg
